New Records: Sunil Chhetri became one of the top three all-time international scorers with 94 goals for India
Key Match Events: The match ended in a 0-0 draw
Pre-Game Insights: Thousands of fans attended the match to support Sunil Chhetri in his farewell game
Post-Match Reflections: Sunil Chhetri had an emotional farewell, waving to fans and thanking them for their support
Miscellaneous Highlights: A large crowd turned out to watch the match, with fans creating banners and chanting in support of Chhetri
